item.title: Des add a quote by Haruki Marukami
item.description: "Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting." -- Haruki Marukami

item.title: Des add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "Human beings are millions of things in one day." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Des add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "For a while" is a phrase whose length can't be measured.At least by the person who's waiting." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Des add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Des add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In truth,there was only one christian and he died on the cross." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Des add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Des add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Des add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Des add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a purpose." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Des add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Des add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours" -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Des add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "What do you think? I'm not a starfish or a pepper tree. I'm a living, breathing human being. Of course I've been in love." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Des add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Everything just blows me away." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Des add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Listen up - there's no war that will end all wars." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Des add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Live to the point of tears." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Des add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "When I write, I feel like an armless, legless man with a crayon in his mouth." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Des add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Here is a lesson in creative writing. First rule: Do not use semicolons. They are transvestite hermaphrodites representing absolutely nothing. All they do is show you've been to college." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Des add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "You don't need a weatherman to know which way the wind blows." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Des add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "All I can be is me- whoever that is. " -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Des add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "The sun's not yellow, its chicken!" -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Des add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "Protons give an atom its identity, electrons its personality." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Des add a quote by Paul Theroux
item.description: "Fiction gives us a second chance that life denies us." -- Paul Theroux

item.title: Des add a quote by Paul Theroux
item.description: "Going slowly [...] was the best way of being reminded that there is a relationship between Here and There, and that travel narrative was the story of There and Back." -- Paul Theroux

item.title: Des add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "...in this ocean of hours I'm all the time drinking..." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Des add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Des add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Des add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Des add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Des add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Des add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "I would rather live my life as if there is a god and die to find out there isn't, than live my life as if there isn't and die to find out there is." -- Albert Camus
